mapper.insert: insert into moviedb (title, titleEng, story, genre, runtime, director, releaseDate, rating, posterurl, stillcuturls, videourl, comments, score, movielike) values(#{title}, #{titleEng}, #{story}, #{genre}, #{runtime}, #{director}, #{releaseDate}, #{rating}, #{posterurl}, #{stillcuturls}, #{videourl}, #{comments}, #{score}, #{movielike} )
mapper.select: select * from moviedb where replace(title,' ','') = replace(#{title},' ','');
